S0193.DECK.  193. SURVEY NUMBER
S0193.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.

S0193.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR ARMY RANK OR GRAD?  1. PRIVATE OR PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 2. TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE OR CORPORAL 3. TECHNICIAN 4TH GRADE OR BUCK SERGEANT 4. FIRST THREE GRADES - STAFF SERGEANT, TECHNICIAN 3RD GRADE OR HIGHER 0. NO ANSWER
S0193.Q2. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDA?  01. 18 YEARS 02. 19 03. 20 04. 21 05. 22 06. 23 07. 24 08. 25 09. 26-29 10. 30-34 11. 35 YEARS AND OVER 00. NO ANSWER

S0193.Q3. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOO?  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER

S0193.Q4. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN OVERSEAS (COUNT FROM THE TIME YOU LEFT THE STATES)*  1. 6 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 6 MONTHS, UP TO 12 MONTHS 3. OVER 12 MONTHS, UP TO 18 MONTHS 4. OVER 18 MONTHS, UP TO 2 YEARS 5. OVER 2 YEARS, UP TO 3 YEARS 6. OVER 3 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S0193.Q5. WHAT BRANCH OF THE ARMY WERE YOU IN WHEN YOU CAME TO THE HOSPITA?  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. SIGNAL CORPS 07. COAST ARTILLERY 08. ANTI-AIRCRAFT 09. AIR CORPS 10. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 11. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 12. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 13. MILITARY POLICE 14. OTHER 15. MARINES 16. NAVY, C.B.,S 00. NO ANSWER

S0193.Q6. ARE YOU STILL ASSIGNED TO YOUR OLD OUTFIT, OR ARE YOU NOW ASSIGNED TO THE HOSPITAL DETACHMENT OF PATIENT?  1. STILL ASSIGNED TO OLD OUTFIT 2. ASSIGNED TO HOSPITAL DETACHMENT OF PATIENTS 3. I DON'T KNOW WHERE I AM ASSIGNED 0. NO ANSWER
S0193.Q7. DO YOU FEEL PROUD OF THE COMPANY (BATTERY, SQUADRON, TROOP) YOU WERE IN WHEN YOU ENTERED THE HOSPITA?  1. YES, VERY PROUD 2. YES, FAIRLY PROUD 3. NO, NOT PROUD 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0193.Q8. ARE YOU EVER WORRIED OR UPSE?  1. I AM OFTEN WORRIED AND UPSET 2. I AM SOMETIMES WORRIED AND UPSET 3. I AM HARDLY EVER WORRIED OR UPSET 0. NO ANSWER
S0193.Q9. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF TIME DO YOU HAVE IN THE ARM?  1. I HAVE A PRETTY GOOD TIME 2. IT'S ABOUT FIFTY-FIFTY 3. I HAVE A PRETTY ROTTEN TIME 0. NO ANSWER
S0193.Q10. ON THE WHOLE, HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE ARM?  1. I LIKE THE ARMY VERY MUCH 2. I LIKE IT FAIRLY WELL 3. I RATHER DISLIKE IT 4. I DISLIKE THE ARMY VERY MUCH 0. NO ANSWER

S0193.Q11A. IN GENERAL, DO YOU THINK THE ARMY HAS TRIED ITS BEST TO SEE THAT MEN GET AS SQUARE A DEAL AS POSSIBL?  1. YES, IT HAS TRIED ITS BEST 2. IT HAS TRIED SOME BUT NOT HARD ENOUGH 3. IT HAS HARDLY TRIED AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S0193.Q11B. IN GENERAL, DO YOU FEEL YOU YOURSELF HAVE GOTTEN A SQUARE DEAL FROM THE ARM?  1. YES, IN MOST WAYS I HAVE 2. IN SOME WAYS, YES, IN OTHER WAYS, NO 3. NO, ON THE WHOLE I HAVE NOT GOTTEN A SQUARE DEAL 0. NO ANSWER
S0193.Q12. DO YOU EVER GET THE FEELING THAT THIS WAR IS NOT WORTH FIGHTIN?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ONLY ONCE IN A GREAT WHILE 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER

S0193.Q13. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT WHAT YOU'VE DONE IN THIS WA?  1. I FEEL I'VE ALREADY DONE MY SHARE AS A SOLDIER AND SHOULD BE SENT HOME 2. I FEEL I'VE ALREADY DONE MY SHARE, BUT I'M WILLING TO DO MORE 3. I DON'T FEEL THAT I'VE DONE MY SHARE YET 0. NO ANSWER

S0193.Q14. IF IT HAD BEEN UP TO YOU TO CHOOSE, DO YOU THINK YOU COULD DO MORE FOR YOUR COUNTRY AS A SOLDIER OR AS A CIVILIAN WORKER IN A WAR JO?  1. AS A SOLDIER 2. AS A WAR WORKER 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0193.Q15. IF THE JAPANESE WERE TO OFFER TO STOP FIGHTING NOW AND TO GIVE UP ALL THE COUNTRIES AND TERRITORY THEY HAVE TAKEN OVER, WHAT DO YOU THINK WE SHOULD D?  1. WE SHOULD ACCEPT THE OFFER AND STOP FIGHTING NOW 2. WE SHOULD CONSIDER THE OFFER AND TRY TO WORK OUT SOME PEACE TERMS WITH THEM 3. WE SHOULD TURN DOWN THE OFFER AND KEEP ON FIGHTING UNTIL THEY GIVE UP COMPLETELY 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0193.Q16. WHY ARE YOU IN THE HOSPITA?  1. GUNSHOT WOUNDS, SHRAPNEL, GRENADES 2. FRACTURE, AMPUTATIONS, BROKEN LEG, BROKEN ARM, STRAINED BACK, ETC. 3. OTHER SURGICAL - APPENDICITIS, RUPTURE, HERNIA OPERATIONS, ETC. 4. STOMACH TROUBLE, ULCERS, DYSENTERY, ETC. 5. OTHER MEDICAL - PNEUMONIA, FEVER, ASTHMA, CHEST PAINS, LUNG TROUBLE, ETC. 6. NERVOUSNESS, DIZZY SPELLS, HEADACHES, FATIGUE, ETC. 7. BURNS (ALL TYPES) 8. UNCLASSIFIABLE (FOR OBSERVATION, DON'T KNOW) 9. MISCELLANEOUS 0. NO ANSWER

S0193.Q17. IF YOU ARE WOUNDED (OR INJURED), WAS YOUR WOUND OR INJURY CAUSED BY ENEMY ACTIO?  1. YES, MY PRESENT WOUND OR INJURY WAS DIRECTLY CAUSED BY ENEMY ACTION 2. NO, IT WAS NOT CAUSED BY ENEMY ACTION 3. I AM SICK, NOT WOUNDED OR INJURED 0. NO ANSWER

S0193.Q18. WHAT ISLAND WERE YOU ON WHEN YOU WERE INJURED OR TAKEN SIC?  01. HAWAIIAN ISLANDS (HOSPITALIZED ON SAME ISLAND) 02. HAWAIIAN ISLANDS (HOSPITALIZED ON OTHER ISLAND) 03. PHILLIPINE ISLANDS (LEYTE, MONDORO) 04. MARIANNAS ISLANDS (SAIPAN, GUAM) 05. CAROLINE ISLANDS (PALAU, ULITHI) 06. MARSHALL ISLANDS (ENIWETOK, KWAJALEIN) 07. GILBERT ISLANDS (TARAWA) 08. NEW HEBRIDES (ESPIRITU SANTOS) 09. SOLOMON ISLANDS (GUADALCANAL) 10. OTHER 00. NO ANSWER

S0193.Q19. HOW MUCH TIME HAVE YOU SPENT IN THIS HOSPITAL WITH YOUR PRESENT INJURY OR ILLNES?  1. 10 DAYS OR LESS 2. OVER 10 DAYS, UP TO 20 DAYS 3. OVER 20 DAYS, UP TO ONE MONTH 4. OVER 1 MONTH, UP TO 2 MONTHS 5. OVER 2 MONTHS, UP TO 3 MONTHS 6. OVER 3 MONTHS, UP TO 4 MONTHS 7. OVER 4 MONTHS, UP TO 5 MONTHS 8. OVER 5 MONTHS, UP TO 6 MONTHS 9. OVER 6 MONTHS 0. NO ANSWER

S0193.Q20. HOW MUCH TIME DID YOU SPEND IN OTHER HOSPITALS OR HOSPITAL SHIPS WITH YOUR PRESENT INJURY OR ILLNES?  01. I HAVE NOT BEEN IN ANY OTHER HOSPITAL WITH THIS INJURY OR ILLNESS 02. 10 DAYS OR LESS 03. OVER 10 DAYS, UP TO 20 DAYS 04. OVER 20 DAYS, UP TO 1 MONTH 05. OVER 1 MONTH, UP TO 2 MONTHS 06. OVER 2 MONTHS, UP TO 3 MONTHS 07. OVER 3 MONTHS, UP TO 4 MONTHS 08. OVER 4 MONTHS, UP TO 5 MONTHS 09. OVER 5 MONTHS, UP TO 6 MONTHS 10. OVER 6 MONTHS 00. NO ANSWER

S0193.Q21. HOW MUCH OF THE TIME DURING THE DAY ARE YOU SUPPOSED TO SPEND IN BE?  1. I DO NOT HAVE TO SPEND ANY TIME IN BED DURING THE DAY 2. I AM ALLOWED TO BE OUT OF BED MOST OF THE TIME DURING THE DAY 3. I AM SUPPOSED TO SPEND MOST OF MY TIME IN BED, BUT I AM ALLOWED TO GET UP A LITTLE 4. I HAVE TO SPEND ALL OF MY TIME IN BED 0. NO ANSWER

S0193.Q22. HOW MANY OF THE DOCTORS YOU HAVE SEEN IN THIS HOSPITAL DO YOU THINK ARE REALLY GOOD DOCTOR?  1. ALL OF THEM 2. MOST OF THEM 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM 4. A FEW OF THEM 5. NONE OF THEM 0. NO ANSWER
S0193.Q23. DO YOU THINK THE DOCTORS AT THIS HOSPITAL TAKE YOUR CASE SERIOUSLY ENOUG?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0193.Q24. HAVE THE DOCTORS TOLD YOU AS MUCH ABOUT YOUR CASE AS YOU COULD REASONABLY EXPECT THEM TO TELL YOU UNDER THE CIRCUMSTANCE?  1. THEY HAVE TOLD ME PRACTICALLY NOTHING ABOUT MY CASE 2. THEY HAVE TOLD ME A LITTLE, BUT NOT MUCH 3. THEY HAVE TOLD ME AS MUCH AS I COULD REASONABLY EXPECT THEM TO TELL ME 0. NO ANSWER

S0193.Q25. ARE THE DOCTORS WILLING TO TALK WITH YOU ABOUT YOUR CASE AND LET YOU ASK QUESTIONS ABOUT I?  1. THEY LET ME ASK, AND THEY TRY TO ANSWER AS WELL AS THEY CAN 2. THEY LET ME ASK, BUT THEY DON'T GIVE ME ANY ANSWERS 3. THEY WON'T EVEN LET ME ASK QUESTIONS 0. NO ANSWER
S0193.Q26. IS THERE ONE PARTICULAR DOCTOR IN THIS HOSPITAL WHO IS IN CHARGE OF YOUR CAS?  1. YES, THERE IS 2. NO, THERE ISN'T 3. I DON'T KNOW IF THERE IS OR NOT 0. NO ANSWER

S0193.Q27. DO YOU THINK THAT THE PARTICULAR DOCTOR IN CHARGE OF YOUR CASE IS REALLY COMPETEN?  1. I'M SURE HE IS COMPETENT 2. I THINK HE IS COMPETENT, BUT I'M NOT SURE 3. I DON'T THINK HE'S AS GOOD AS HE SHOULD BE 4. THERE IS NO PARTICULAR DOCTOR IN CHARGE OF MY CASE 0. NO ANSWER

S0193.Q28A. HOW WELL DO YOU LIKE THE DOCTOR IN CHARGE OF YOUR CAS?  1. I LIKE HIM VERY MUCH 2. I LIKE HIM FAIRLY WELL 3. I DON'T PARTICULARLY LIKE HIM 4. THERE IS NO PARTICULAR DOCTOR IN CHARGE OF MY CASE 0. NO ANSWER
S0193.Q28B. WHY DO YOU FEEL THE WAY YOU D?  1. VERY CAPABLE, KNOWS HIS BUSINESS, GOOD DOCTOR 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0193.Q28B. WHY DO YOU FEEL THE WAY YOU D?  121 1. ACTS HUMAN, VERY CHEERFUL, VERY FRIENDLY 1159 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0193.Q28B. WHY DO YOU FEEL THE WAY YOU D?  51 1. TELLS ME ABOUT MY CASE, VERY EASY TO TALK TO 1229 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0193.Q28B. WHY DO YOU FEEL THE WAY YOU D?  133 1. HAS PERSONAL INTEREST IN MY CASE, DOES ALL HE CAN FOR ME 1147 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0193.Q28B. WHY DO YOU FEEL THE WAY YOU D?  26 1. OTHER POSITIVE COMMENTS 1254 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0193.Q28B. WHY DO YOU FEEL THE WAY YOU D?  17 1. NOT A GOOD DOCTOR, GIVES POOR TREATMENTS 1263 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0193.Q28B. WHY DO YOU FEEL THE WAY YOU D?  21 1. TOO CURT, NEVER SMILES, NOT FRIENDLY 1259 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0193.Q28B. WHY DO YOU FEEL THE WAY YOU D?  20 1. DOESN'T GIVE ME ANY INFORMATION 1260 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0193.Q28B. WHY DO YOU FEEL THE WAY YOU D?  32 1. DOESN'T TAKE A PERSONAL INTEREST IN MY CASE 1248 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0193.Q28B. WHY DO YOU FEEL THE WAY YOU D?  25 1. OTHER NEGATIVE COMMENTS 1255 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0193.Q28B. WHY DO YOU FEEL THE WAY YOU D?  814 1. NO ANSWER 466 2. NOT CHOSEN

S0193.Q29. DO YOU THINK YOU ARE AS COMFORTABLE IN THIS HOSPITAL AS YOU WOULD BE IN AN ARMY HOSPITAL ON THE MAINLAN?  1. YES, I AM JUST AS COMFORTABLE HERE 2. NO, I WOULD BE MORE COMFORTABLE IN AN ARMY HOSPITAL ON THE MAINLAND 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0193.Q30. WHERE DO YOU THINK PATIENTS WOULD GET THE BEST MEDICAL TREATMENT - AT THIS HOSPITAL OR AT ARMY HOSPITALS ON THE MAINLAN?  1. AT THIS HOSPITAL 2. AT ARMY HOSPITALS ON THE MAINLAND 3. NO DIFFERENCE 0. NO ANSWER

S0193.Q31. WHERE DO YOU THINK PATIENTS WOULD GET THE BEST MEDICAL TREATMENT - AT THIS HOSPITAL OR AT A CIVILIAN HOSPITAL ON THE MAINLAN?  1. AT THIS HOSPITAL 2. AT A CIVILIAN HOSPITAL ON THE MAINLAND 3. NO DIFFERENCE 0. NO ANSWER

S0193.Q32. YOU PROBABLY KNOW THAT HOSPITALS OUT HERE SEND SOME OF THEIR PATIENTS BACK TO HOSPITALS ON THE MAINLAND. WHAT DO YOU THINK IS THE MAIN REASON WHY THESE PATIENTS ARE SENT BACK INSTEAD OF BEING KEPT IN HOSPITALS OVER HER?  1. MAKE ROOM FOR MORE PATIENTS HERE, HOSPITALS ARE CROWDED, BATTLE CASUALTIES COMING IN 2. NOT CHOSEN

S0193.Q33A. DO YOU THINK THAT THE DOCTORS IN CHARGE OF YOUR CASE SHOULD RECOMMEND SENDING YOU TO A HOSPITAL ON THE MAINLAN?  1. YES, I THINK I SHOULD BE SENT BACK TO A HOSPITAL ON THE MAINLAND 2. NO, I THOUGHT SO WHEN I FIRST CAME TO THE HOSPITAL, BUT I DON'T THINK I SHOULD BE SENT BACK NOW 3. NO, I NEVER THOUGHT THAT I SHOULD BE SENT BACK TO A HOSPITAL ON THE MAINLAND 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 33B NOT CODED.

S0193.Q34. DO YOU THINK THAT YOU WILL BE SENT BACK TO A HOSPITAL ON THE MAINLAN?  1. I THINK THERE IS A GOOD CHANCE THAT I WILL BE SENT BACK 2. I THINK THERE IS A FAIR CHANCE THAT I WILL BE SENT BACK 3. I DON'T THINK THERE IS ANY CHANCE THAT I WILL BE SENT BACK 0. NO ANSWER

S0193.Q35. DO YOU THINK THAT YOU SHOULD GET A MEDICAL DISCHARGE FROM THE ARMY WHEN YOU ARE RELEASED FROM THE HOSPITA?  1. YES, I THINK THAT I SHOULD GET A MEDICAL DISCHARGE 2. NO, I DON'T THINK MY INJURY (OR SICKNESS) IS SERIOUS ENOUGH 0. NO ANSWER

S0193.Q36. DO YOU THINK THAT YOU WILL GET A MEDICAL DISCHARGE FROM THE ARMY WHEN YOU ARE RELEASED FROM THE HOSPITA?  1. I THINK THERE IS A GOOD CHANCE THAT I WILL GET A MEDICAL DISCHARGE 2. I THINK THERE IS A FAIR CHANCE THAT I WILL GET A MEDICAL DISCHARGE 3. I DON'T THINK THERE IS ANY CHANCE THAT I WILL GET A MEDICAL DISCHARGE 0. NO ANSWER

S0193.Q37. IF YOU ARE RETURNED TO DUTY WHEN YOU ARE RELEASED FROM THE HOSPITAL, DO YOU THINK YOU WILL BE PUT ON GENERAL DUTY OR ON "SPECIAL ASSIGNMENT" (LIMITED ASSIGNMENT DUTY)*  1. I'LL PROBABLY BE PUT ON GENERAL DUTY 2. I'LL PROBABLY BE PUT ON "SPECIAL ASSIGNMENT" 3. I HAVE NO IDEA 0. NO ANSWER

S0193.Q38. IF YOU ARE RETURNED TO DUTY WHEN YOU ARE RELEASED FROM THE HOSPITAL, DO YOU THINK YOU WILL BE SENT BACK TO YOUR OLD OUTFIT OR BE ASSIGNED TO SOME OTHER OUTFI?  1. I'LL PROBABLY BE SENT BACK TO MY OLD OUTFIT 2. I'LL PROBABLY BE ASSIGNED TO SOME OTHER OUTFIT 3. I HAVE NO IDEA 0. NO ANSWER

S0193.Q39. IF YOU ARE ABLE TO HANDLE YOUR OLD JOB WHEN YOU GET OUT OF THE HOSPITAL, WOULD YOU RATHER GO BACK TO YOUR OLD OUTFIT OR BE ASSIGNED TO SOME OTHER OUTFI?  1. I WANT VERY MUCH TO GO BACK TO MY OLD OUTFIT 2. I WOULD RATHER GO BACK TO MY OLD OUTFIT, BUT IT IS NOT VERY IMPORTANT TO ME 3. I WOULD RATHER BE ASSIGNED TO SOME OTHER OUTFIT, BUT IT IS NOT VERY IMPORTANT TO ME 4. I WANT VERY MUCH TO BE ASSIGNED TO SOME OTHER OUTFIT 0. NO ANSWER

S0193.Q40. IN GENERAL, HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE LENGTH OF TIME MEN ARE USUALLY KEPT IN ARMY HOSPITAL?  1. PATIENTS ARE USUALLY KEPT IN THE HOSPITAL TOO LONG 2. PATIENTS ARE USUALLY KEPT IN THE HOSPITAL ABOUT THE RIGHT LENGTH OF TIME 3. PATIENTS ARE USUALLY NOT KEPT IN THE HOSPITAL LONG ENOUGH 0. NO ANSWER

S0193.Q41. ABOUT HOW LONG DO YOU THINK IT WILL BE BEFORE YOU ARE IN CONDITION TO LEAVE THE HOSPITA?  1. A WEEK OR LESS 2. 2 OR 3 WEEKS 3. A MONTH OR SO 4. 2 OR 3 MONTHS 5. OVER 3 MONTHS 6. I AM WELL ENOUGH TO LEAVE NOW 7. I DON'T KNOW HOW LONG IT WILL BE 0. NO ANSWER
S0193.Q42A. HOW WOULD YOU RATE THE JOB BEING DONE BY THE NURSES IN YOUR WAR?  1. SUPERIOR 2. EXCELLENT 3. SATISFACTORY 4. UNSATISFACTORY 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 42B NOT CODED.
S0193.Q43A. HOW WOULD YOU RATE THE JOB BEING DONE BY THE WARD MEN (ENLISTED MEN) IN YOUR WAR?  1. SUPERIOR 2. EXCELLENT 3. SATISFACTORY 4. UNSATISFACTORY 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 43B NOT CODED.

S0193.Q44A. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU, WOULD YOU HAVE NURSES IN HOSPITALS LIKE THIS OR WOULD YOU HAVE ALL THE WORK DONE BY TRAINED ENLISTED ME?  1. HAVE BOTH NURSES AND ENLISTED MEN 2. HAVE ONLY ENLISTED MEN 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 44B NOT CODED.

S0193.Q45. DOES TIME SEEM TO PASS QUICKLY IN THE HOSPITA?  1. TIME GOES BY VERY QUICKLY IN THE HOSPITAL 2. IT GOES BY ABOUT AS FAST HERE AS ANYWHERE ELSE 3. TIME GOES BY VERY SLOWLY 0. NO ANSWER CARD 2

S0193.Q54. WHAT WAS THE LAST MONTH FOR WHICH YOU WERE PAI? REMEMBER THAT THE ARMY PAYS MEN AT THE END OF A MONTH FOR TIME PUT IN DURING THE MONTH JUST ENDED. FOR EXAMPLE, PAY RECEIVED ABOUT THE FIRST OF DECEMBER WOULD BE FOR MONEY EARNED IN NOVEMBER.  1. DECEMBER 1944 2. NOVEMBER 3. OCTOBER 4. SEPTEMBER 5. AUGUST 6. JULY 7. JUNE OR BEFORE 0. NO ANSWER
